root.name: image()
root.description:
Displays images to the screen. The images must be in the sketch's "data" directory to load correctly. Select "Add file..." from the "Sketch" menu to add the image to the data directory, or just drag the image file onto the sketch window. Processing currently works with GIF, JPEG, and Targa images. The img parameter specifies the image to display and the x and y parameters define the location of the image from its upper-left corner. The image is displayed at its original size unless the width and height parameters specify a different size. The imageMode() function can be used to change the way these parameters are interpreted.

The color of an image may be modified with the tint() function. This function will maintain transparency for GIF and PNG images.
